data.eml:eml: New species of the gorgoniian genus Pacifigorgia (Coelenterata: Octocorallia: Gorgoniidae) from Pacific Panama

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Breedy, Odalisca, Guzman, Hector M. (2004): New species of the gorgoniian genus Pacifigorgia (Coelenterata: Octocorallia: Gorgoniidae) from Pacific Panama. Zootaxa 541: 1-15, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157702
